CustomField.description: If unchecked, Stripe will charge the default PM on the Customer. If checked, new Invoices are automatically updated to match the PM set on Subscription.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If unchecked, Stripe will charge the default PM on the Customer. If checked, new Invoices are automatically updated to match the PM set on Subscription.
CustomField.label: Update Invoices with Subscription PM
